name: Red Hazard
description:
A couple hours has passed since the outbreak, the last open refuge are closing the doors. This is the last chance of a survivor, and your last chance to escape the Red Hazard. 

Controls: 
*WASD : Walk;
*Shift: Run;
*R: Reload;
*Mouse: Aim and Shoot;

Note: Your body color represents your life count, be careful!

(Hard Mode Challenge): Try to beat it without running! :D
 

Created by Guilherme Gava Barreiros for Post Apocalyptic Jam (Fatec Ourinhos College).
